overview:
Software, Emerging Technologies, Web 2.0, New Media, Start-Ups, Venture Capitalists,Telecommunications, Financial, Insurance, Retail Trade, Manufacturing, Wholesale Trade, Transportation and Warehousing, real estate, Information Technology (IT) Executive, Sales and Marketing, Technology, Research and Development, Human Resources (HR), Recruitment, Recruiter, Head Hunter,New Business Development, Inside Sales, Cold Calling, E-Marketing, Account Manager, Account Executive, Java, Perl, Ruby, PHP, Python, .NET, Flash, Action Script, AS2, AS3, Flex, FBML, SEO, SEM Specialties

Hireglyphics offers strategic recruitment solutions for Software, New Media and Emerging Technology Start-Ups within the GTA and Waterloo area. We are well known for our traditional headhunting techniques and confident in our abilities to provide our clients with a superior service. Our business model delivers “quality not quantity”.
